column4: does ubuntu cache the settings of xorg.conf?  asking because i added a resolution to the listing, rebooted and cannot select the new resolution
xorg says i have the nv driver installed
see what says in the file /var/log/Xorg.0.log about that resolution
hysnc out of range...so im guessing update driver, reboot x and all should be solved?
that mean that the mode is not in the range valid for that monitor
its my 1080p lcd monitor so it should handle the resolution, maybe the drivers i have currently cant support it
